name: SunShine Death Valley
text: Increase the ATK of all "SunShine" monsters on the field by 500, but their DEF becomes 0. When this card is activated: You can send one "SunShine" card from your hand to the GY, and target one "SunShine" card on the field; shuffle that target into the Deck then send the top card of your Deck to the GY. You can send one "SunShine" card you control to the GY; send all Spell cards on the field to the GY, except "SunShine Death Valley". If this card is in your GY, you can banish this card; banish a Field Spell your opponent controls. You can only use each effect of "SunShine Death Valley" once per turn.
